answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Other than IBS or spastic colon you could be suffering from Celiac Disease/Ulcerative Colitis/ Crohn’s disease, H pylori infection, diabetes, food intolerance, malabsorption syndromes, constipation, gallbladder and liver problems, pancreatic dysfunction, or taking a diet rich in sulfites. Cancers of the gut too could be a cause. It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage. Do consult your doctor. Take care!

question: following eating during the course of the day my torso is very distended and has a uncomfortable soild feeling
title: what is the reason for abdominal distention
